history.content:
👑+💻=👩‍💻 (you)

Girls Who Code at Berkeley presents She🅱️UILDS 2.0 — the SECOND iteration of our two-day hackathon for female identifying and non-binary high school and college students!

Our event is FREE and will be hosted in a HYBRID format from Saturday, April 2 and Sunday, April 3, 2022. 💫

🗓 WHEN: Saturday, April 2 and Sunday, April 3, 2022
📍WHERE: Jacobs Hall 310 on UC Berkeley Campus or virtually via Zoom and Slack

🌟REGISTER HERE!🌟

Attendees: tinyurl.com/shebuilds2-attendee
Mentors: tinyurl.com/shebuilds2-mentor
Judges: tinyurl.com/shebuilds2-judge

As a beginner-friendly hackathon, we aim to equip our participants with 21st-century skills in order to help close the gender gap in technology and to change the image of what a programmer looks like and does.

We offer three UNIQUE tracks regarding tackling social justice and unconscious bias, women in STEM education, and a fun passion hack to help kickstart your ideas! 👩‍💻🧑‍💻👩‍💻🧑‍💻👩‍💻🧑‍💻👩‍💻

Join us to:
✨Meet incredible women in STEM
✨Network with industry sponsors
✨Participate in technical workshops and activities
✨Gain social and navigational capital with tech
✨Build projects with your gal pals to enhance your resume or portfolio
✨ Receive SWAG from GWC and company sponsors
history.subject: Girls Who Code at Berkeley x sheBUILDS 2.0 is HERE!
